title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.12 - Federal home loan bank of new york
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.12 - Federal home loan bank of new york

State Regulations

Any bank or trust company is permitted to invest in shares of
common stock of the Federal Home Loan Bank of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
31.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
